title: Project
description: A project represents a top-level work context with its own working directory and associated tasks

workingDir.description: Absolute path to the project's working directory

description.description: Optional detailed description of the project's purpose and scope
examples: A complete redesign of the company website with focus on mobile responsiveness

createdAt.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the project was created

updatedAt.description: Unix timestamp (milliseconds) when the project was last updated
